basic.description: In-depth analysis of the genetics, biochemistry, assembly and function of the major structures of the procaryotic cell. Emphasis on the experimental approaches in the current literature. (Offered in alternate years to BMED-836* and concurrently with MICR-435* with additional work required.) Winter term, two hours lecture, one hour tutorial. K. Jarrell.   EXCLUSION: MICR-835*
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Advanced Procaryotic Structure and Function
